title: Such a great story
review:
It's all happening in Sweet Pea's mind, she says it from the beginning of the film.
Sweet created Baby doll to facilitate her escape from the real world, in which, Baby doll's purpose was to help Sweet escape and replace Sweet's place for the lobotomy .

title: great solo film, very bad x men one
review: First I really like gore movies like this but This movie just put everything the x men did the past 100 years and throw it to trash. Could've been very very great movie as a solo.
